QuestData.Title: Aces High!
QuestData.Description: Again we meet, $r. I confess, your presence is beginning to grow on me.$b$bAm I correct in assuming that you've come to hone your aerial combat skills?$b$bAs always, my pets stand ready to bring fiery destruction to the enemy.$b$bSpeak, and they shall be at your disposal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Corastrasza on the upper ring of the Nexus in Coldarra wants you to ride her drake and kill 5 Scalesworn Elites.
QuestData.RewardText: I noticed some improvement today, $c. At moments, it was as if you were one with the drake.$b$bYou are welcome to practice with my precious pets at your leisure.
